DataFormats Module
==================

The DataFormats module provides tools for converting between different image and data formats.

.. automodule:: DataTools.DataFormats
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

TIFF to Zarr Conversion
-----------------------

.. automodule:: DataTools.DataFormats.tiff2zarr
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

BMP to Zarr Conversion
----------------------

.. automodule:: DataTools.DataFormats.bmp2zarr
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Zarr to TIFF Conversion
-----------------------

.. automodule:: DataTools.DataFormats.zarr2tiff
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Utilities
---------

.. automodule:: DataTools.DataFormats.utils
   :members:
